page.title: 20Wragby School
page.content:
The school was moved from old Victorian buildings to the present purpose_built premises in 1968.It was intended to cater for six classes,but there have only ever been five.The {staff of five teachers (including a {teaching head)}has responsibility for about{125 pupils.}Two other members of staff ( school secretary and cleaner_in_charge) and two 'dinner ladies' are also employed.
Work for the 'Domesday Project' was carried out mainly by Class 1 under a temporary supply teacher,during the Head's secondment,but all other members of staff helped on the information_gathering excursions. Completed work was edited and transferred to disc by Mrs.A.Jones.
